Package client

Class MyGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • tage.VariableFrameRateGame
      • client.MyGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
    public class MyGame
extends tage.VariableFrameRateGame
    This the main class that initializes the game and houses all necessary variables

      [DEBUG] prints a popup message the the HUD.

      [DEBUG] An input action class for moving backwards with the keyboard (always towards the world -Z axis).

      [DEBUG] An input action class for moving forward with the keyboard (always towards the world Z axis).
      class  MyGame.Key_Move_Left
      [DEBUG] An input action class for moving to the left with the keyboard (always towards the world -X axis).
      class  MyGame.Key_Move_Right
      [DEBUG] An input action class for moving to the left with the keyboard (always towards the world X axis).

      An input action class for rotating the view downward using the keyboard.
      class  MyGame.Key_RotUp
      An input action class for rotating the view upward using the keyboard.
      class  MyGame.KeyCamLeft
      An action class for orbiting the camera left with the keyboard/
      class  MyGame.KeyCamRight
      An action class for orbiting the camera right with the keyboard/
      class  MyGame.LStickX
      [OBSOLETE] An input action class for when the left control stick is moved left or right.
      class  MyGame.LStickY
      [OBSOLETE] An input action class for when the left control stick is moved up or down.
      class  MyGame.RStickX
      An input action class for using the right stick to control the camera rotation
      class  MyGame.RStickY
      An input action class for using the right stick to control the camera height
      class  MyGame.TestSwing
      [DEBUG] A function to test swing the ball with a consistent angle
      class  MyGame.ToggleDebug
      [DEBUG} An action class for turning debug mode on/off
      class  MyGame.TogglePhysics
      [DEBUG] action class for toggling physics simulation
      class  MyGame.TogglePhysRender
      [DEBUG] action class for toggling physics rendering
      class  MyGame.ZoomIn
      An action class for zooming the camera in closer (both keyboard and gamepad)
      class  MyGame.ZoomOut
      An action class for zooming the camera farther away (both keyboard and gamepad)

      • loadSkyBoxes

        public void loadSkyBoxes()
        Description copied from class: tage.VariableFrameRateGame
        The game application should override this function and build skyboxes in it. This method is called by the RenderSystem from init(), because the GL context must exist to build an OpenGL Cubemap.
        Overrides:
        loadSkyBoxes in class tage.VariableFrameRateGame

      • loadSounds

        public void loadSounds()
        Description copied from class: tage.VariableFrameRateGame
        The game application should override this function and load all game sounds in it. This method is called once by VariableFrameGame before the game loop starts.
        Overrides:
        loadSounds in class tage.VariableFrameRateGame

      • update

        public void update()
        Description copied from class: tage.VariableFrameRateGame
        Performs all game-specific per-frame processing. This typically includes moving the objects, updating state information, etc. The game application should override this function. It is called by the engine. It is not necessary to call super.update().
        Specified by:
        update in class tage.VariableFrameRateGame

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Description copied from class: tage.VariableFrameRateGame
        Handles key and mouse listener tasks. The game application should override this function, and the last line of code in the function should be super.keyPressed(e) where "e" is the captured event.
        Specified by:
        keyPressed in interface java.awt.event.KeyListener
        Overrides:
        keyPressed in class tage.VariableFrameRateGame

      • updateCam

        public void updateCam()
        A void function called by the update() function every time. It moves the view camera into the same position and rotation as the "CamOb" object, which is not rendered. This is done to simplify camera movement functions.

      • checkDist

        public boolean checkDist​(tage.GameObject o1,
                         tage.GameObject o2,
                         float dist)
        Tells other functions whether two GameObjects are a specified distance from each other. Makes use of the getDist function.
        Parameters:
        o1 - The first GameObject to compare.
        o2 - The second GameObject to compare.
        dist - The distance you'd like to check whether the two GameObjects are within.
        Returns:
        True if the two objects are closer then the specified distance, or false if they are not.

      • checkDist

        public boolean checkDist​(org.joml.Vector3f loc1,
                         org.joml.Vector3f loc2,
                         float dist)
        Tells other functions whether two GameObjects are a specified distance from each other. Makes use of the getDist function. This version uses Vec3 location data.
        Parameters:
        loc1 - Vec3 location 1
        loc2 - Vec3 location 2
        dist - The distance you'd like to check whether the two GameObjects are within.
        Returns:
        True if the two objects are closer then the specified distance, or false if they are not.

                     tage.GameObject o2)
        Returns the distance between two GameObjects.
        Parameters:

        o2 - The second GameObject to compare.
        Returns:
        the distance between the two objects.
